text: Egha Iesus men sure gamua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Gumazamizibar Otarim bar mɨzazir ekiaba koma osɨmtɨziba iniam. Eghtɨ Judabar gumazir aruaba, koma ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba, koma Judan Arazibagh fozir gumaziba, me an aghuaghɨva a mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham. Egh dughiar pumuning ko mɨkezim gɨvaghtɨ a ua dɨkavigham.”
